name: yoast/duplicate-post
description: The go-to tool for cloning posts and pages, including the powerful Rewrite & Republish feature.

scripts-descriptions.lint: Check the PHP files for parse errors.
scripts-descriptions.cs: See a menu with the code style checking script options.
scripts-descriptions.check-cs-thresholds: Check the PHP files for code style violations and best practices and verify the number of issues does not exceed predefined thresholds.
scripts-descriptions.check-cs: Check the PHP files for code style violations and best practices, ignoring warnings.
scripts-descriptions.check-cs-warnings: Check the PHP files for code style violations and best practices, including warnings.
scripts-descriptions.check-staged-cs: Check the staged PHP files for code style violations and best practices.
scripts-descriptions.check-branch-cs: Check the PHP files changed in the current branch for code style violations and best practices.
scripts-descriptions.fix-cs: Auto-fix code style violations in the PHP files.
scripts-descriptions.test: Run the unit tests without code coverage.
scripts-descriptions.coverage: Run the unit tests with code coverage.
scripts-descriptions.test-wp: Run the WP unit tests without code coverage.
scripts-descriptions.coverage-wp: Run the WP unit tests with code coverage.
